Package controller

Class NewOfferController

java.lang.Object
controller.NewOfferController
All Implemented Interfaces:
OfferTblPreviewObserver, ProductListObserver
public class NewOfferController extends Object implements OfferTblPreviewObserver, ProductListObserver
Author:
ikojic000 The NovaPonudaController class represents a controller that manages the creation of new offers. It handles the functionality of populating combo boxes and tables, adding and removing products from the table, calculating the total price, generating PDF files, and more.

    Constructs a new NovaPonudaController object and initializes its fields.

  • Constructor Details

    • NewOfferController

      public NewOfferController(NewOfferPanel novaPonudaPanel)
      Constructs a new NovaPonudaController object and initializes its fields.
      Parameters:
      novaPonudaPanel - the NovaPonudaPanel object that represents the GUI panel for creating new offers

  • Method Details

    • setComboBoxData

      public void setComboBoxData()
      Populates the combo box in the NovaPonudaPanel object with data from the ProductDAO object.

    • setTableData

      public void setTableData()
      Sets the OfferTblPreviewModel as Table Model to the table on the panel panel. OfferTblPreviewModel accepts list of OfferTblPreviewData objects. Adds NovaPonudaController as a OfferTblPreviewObserver observer.

    • addProductToTable

      public void addProductToTable(Object objProd, Integer pieces, Integer discount)
      Adds a new product to the tblPreviewData field and updates the table and total price accordingly.
      Parameters:
      objProd - the product to be added
      pieces - the number of pieces of the product to be added
      discount - the discount to be applied to the product

    • removeProductFromTable

      public void removeProductFromTable()
      Removes the selected product from the tblPreviewData field and updates the table and total price accordingly.

    • clearTable

      public void clearTable()
      Removes all products from the tblPreviewData field and updates the table and total price accordingly.

    • calculateTotal

      public void calculateTotal()
      Calculates the total price of all items in the offer and displays it in the appropriate UI component. Also calculates the total price with discounts included.

    • autocopletePatient

      public void autocopletePatient()
      Autocompletes the patient name field based on existing patient names.

    • setPriceTxt

      public void setPriceTxt()
      Sets the price text of the currently selected product in the appropriate UI component.

    • generatePDF

      public void generatePDF(Offer offer)
      Generates a PDF file for the specified offer, saves it to disk, and updates the offer's URL. Also updates the offer in the database and notifies observers of the offer list.
      Parameters:
      offer - the offer to generate a PDF for

    • tableModelDataChanged

      public void tableModelDataChanged()
      Updates the UI component that shows total price after the table values have been changed.
      Specified by:
      tableModelDataChanged in interface OfferTblPreviewObserver

    • updateProductList

      public void updateProductList()
      Updates the UI component that shows list of all products after that list was changed.
      Specified by:
      updateProductList in interface ProductListObserver
